name: CompTIA A+
description: CompTIA A+ is entry level certificate for the person who is new in cyber security field and it is also recommended for beginners.

name: Cisco CCNA
description: Cisco provides computer network certificate to gain the knowledge of networking and its tools.

name: Certified Ethical Hacker(CEH)
description: Certified Ethical Hacker(CEH) helps you to get good knowledge about Ethical Hacking.

name: CompTIA Security+
description: CompTIA Security+ is mid level certificate for the person who have basic knowledge of cyber security.

name: CISSP
description: This certificate is recommended for the person who is interested in cloud security.
